1.content:
Robin sat at his desk in his smart business suit, and waited for the next person to enter, knowing too well it was Mr. Potter again, trying once more to get the loan he so desperately needed to keep his sandwich shop running. It was a small town and everyone knew Mr. Potter, a kind, honest man, who always paid his debts, but because of his age the greedy Banker Mr. King would not allow the loan to go through.

"he'll die before I get my money back" Mr. King had spouted between puffs on his fine cuban cigar, each time Robin had brought him the loan document for approval. He wished there was something he could do for dear Mr. Potter.

The door opened and Mr. Potter walked through cane in hand half bent with back pain that he worked through every day, but never let it stop him. If anyone deserved a loan it was this man.

"how goes it today Mr. P" Robin asked with a genuine smile and shook the old gents hand.
"I reckon um still breathin', it must be a good un" the old man retorted.

With pleasantries out of the way that sat down to business and filled out the loan request for.

"I dont know why um botherin'" Mr. Potter said as he added the last signiture to the last form and slid the across the desk toward Robin.
"who knows Mr. P. today may be your lucky day... Ill be right back"

He knew today would be more of the same, He hated to even take the paper to his boss, because it always enraged him the things the greedy jerk would say. But for Mr. Potter he'd try one more time.

He knocked on King's door, and then turned the knob to open it. King was not in his office, but there on the desk was the approval stamp, and no king in sight. He had half a notion to stamp the approval himself and file it away before king had a chance to notice... He glanced around, it was lunchtime and the office was almost empty no one would know if he just went ahead and approved the man's loan..

turn aound and go back to kings office
11.content: You ease into the office, and as if fate were helping you get the poor old gentleman's loan approval the top drawer of King's desk is ajar and you see the stamp throught the crack. You slide the drawer open, and pull out the stamp. Hesitating, you rethinking the pan, and knowing that the old man needs the loan so desperately you quickly stamp teh paper throw the stamp back into teh draw and leave the office, not even bothering to shut the drawer, and not thiniing about it unil you were just about to enter the door of your own office. 11.title: stamp the approval

choices: Confront King about his nasty attitude and tell him what you did
go on about your day as if nothing has happened
pack up your desk and leave without a word to anyone
111.content:
You step into your office and see none other than King standing there beside Mr. Potter, and you freeze, not sure where to go from here. You try to play it cool, throwingthe file on ytour desk and telling Mr. Potter we need to go over a bit more paper work. Mr. King, what brings you by? you as innocently.
"if ive said it once ive said it a thousand times Potter, there is no way your old ass is getting a loan here."
Potter seemed the shrink with the foul words King sputtered at him, and in his smallness you saw a single tear drip from his eyes as he said
" I was a soldier, I fought for this country, and what has this country ever done for me? It seems so in vain now."
You are steaming mad, and on the verge of boiling over, but King is our boss, atleast until he realizes what you've done, so you try to keep your cool.
"mr. king, if i cant help you with anything, id like to go over a few otions available to Mr. potter so I can move on to the next client sir" You are pleased with the way you handled yourself, and give yourself a pat on the back as King leaves your office, leaving a few more harsh words in his wake, but gone none the less.
When you are sure he is gone, and out of ear shot you open the folder and produce teh paper with the stamped approval on it, and hand it to potter, who;s eyes lit up with excitement.
"how did you manage this" he asks you
"don't worry about it, i just did, but you better hurry and cash the check before im busted" you say
Potter thanks you and leaves with haste.
